attributes.action: ensure the anonymity of the Officers of the Royal Navy who made the decision to allow the Royal Navy detainee sailors in Iran to receive payments for their stories.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the decision was wrong the Officers of the Navy appear to have made this decision in good faith.  There appears to be no good that can come from a 'witch hunt'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
